name: Dragonblade
description: A powerful sword forged from the scales of a dragon.
looks: The Dragonblade has a curved blade with intricate engravings along its surface. The hilt is made from polished dragon bone and is adorned with precious gemstones.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when equipped.

name: Emerald Ring
description: A beautiful ring set with a large emerald gemstone. It is said to enhance the wearer's powers of healing.
looks: The emerald ring has a simple yet elegant design. The band is made of polished silver, and the emerald gemstone is set in a claw-shaped setting.

special_effects.healing_affinity: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Staff of Fire
description: A powerful staff infused with the elemental energy of fire.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak and has a carved dragon head at the top. Flames flicker and dance within the dragon's open mouth.

special_effects.fire_damage: Deals additional fire damage on attacks.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Increases damage and effectiveness of fire spells.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword has a gleaming blade that reflects light. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with intricate silver engravings.

special_weapon_skills.sword_combat: Grants a bonus to Sword Combat skill when wielded.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of iron.
looks: The sword has a straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around a metal handle. The pommel is a simple design with a rounded shape.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword suitable for beginners.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip, and the pommel is plain and unadorned.

name: Iron Spear
description: A sturdy spear made of iron
looks: The iron spear has a long wooden shaft with a pointed iron tip. It is well-crafted and balanced for throwing or thrusting attacks.

special_weapon_skills.polearm: Increases damage and accuracy when using polearm weapons.

name: Iron Gauntlets
description: Strong iron gauntlets that offer hand protection and increased melee damage.
looks: The iron gauntlets are made from solid iron and have a bulky appearance. They have reinforced knuckles and finger guards for added protection.

name: Silver Necklace
description: A delicate necklace made from pure silver.
looks: The silver necklace is a fine chain with a small pendant in the shape of a crescent moon.

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautifully crafted bow made by skilled elven craftsmen.
looks: The Elven Bow is made from a light and flexible wood, intricately carved with elven symbols and adorned with ethereal decorations. It has a smooth and polished surface, giving it a radiant and elegant appearance.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the spell of Fireball. When activated, it unleashes a powerful burst of fire that damages enemies.
looks: The scroll is made from parchment and is sealed with a wax seal. It has intricate runes and symbols drawn on it, representing the spell of Fireball.

special_effects.area_of_effect: The Fireball Scroll damages all enemies within a certain radius of the target.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a hilt made of leather wrapped around the handle. It has a simple yet functional design.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made from high-quality steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a double-edged design. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Adamantite Sword
description: A powerful sword forged from adamantite, known for its strength and durability.
looks: The Adamantite Sword has a long, straight blade with a shimmering silver color. The handle is wrapped in black leather with gold accents. The sword has an intricate crossguard and pommel, adorned with intricate engravings.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: Armor created from the scales of a mighty dragon. It provides exceptional protection against physical and elemental attacks.
looks: The Dragon Scale Armor is intricately crafted from the scales of a dragon, giving it a unique and imposing appearance. The scales are colored in shades of vibrant red and gold, arranged to form an armor that covers the entire body. The armor glimmers with a faint magical aura.
